title: Technology Titans
description: Match the companies with their founders

words.fact: Netflix was founded by Reed Hastings in 1997, initially as a DVD rental service before revolutionizing streaming entertainment.
Snapchat was created by Evan Spiegel, Bobby Murphy, and Reggie Brown while they were students at Stanford University in 2011.
Shazam was co-founded by Chris Barton, Dhiraj Mukherjee, Avery Wang, and Philip Inghelbrecht in 1999, launching before smartphones even existed.
LinkedIn was founded by Reid Hoffman and launched in 2003, becoming the world's largest professional networking platform with over 900 million members.
WhatsApp was founded by Jan Koum and Brian Acton in 2009, later acquired by Facebook for $19 billion in 2014, one of the largest tech acquisitions ever.
